message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its potential value, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,300,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. Can you consider meeting me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $1,100,000 is tempting, the product's value justifies a higher price. I'm willing to come down to $1,225,000. This is my final offer.
I understand that the product has value, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $1,175,000. Can you consider this compromise?
